name: Crazy Lifter 3d: City Battle of Elevators.
name_original: Crazy Lifter 3d: City Battle of Elevators.
description:
In crazy lifters world new big changes. At now, each passengers has its weight and height. Elevators also has max allowed load capacity, more or less 900 pounds. Be careful - overload it could cause serious consequences. Who knows -  if it can bear more than allowed weight. 

Maybe it won't even be that big a deal, but may be - elevator crash down... Sight what happens when you overload and try avoid it. 

Attempting to start the movement before closing the doors and trying to open the doors in movement is also unpleasant now, but not punishable. Just yet. But in the future everything can change.

New sound, completely new AI for passengers and enemy elevator, new special effects - this it`s all for new experience in epic battle between two elevator. 

Engage in a fierce battle with the enemy, who also controls the elevator, to prove forever the superiority of human skill over a soulless machine!

Ability Play with friend on one device! New game modes (unlimited and solo), new UI (thanks to Ian Corvin) available now! Enjoy:)

You have to quickly make strategic decisions, show ingenuity and logic, serious reaction.

- New photo-realistic graphics
- These sounds recorded from the elevators of our high-rise buildings
- Believable animation
- New artificial intelligence for the enemy and passengers
- Ability to adjust the quality / performance
- Unique casual gaming experience with non-standard gameplay

Please write your wishes and suggestions. We will definitely consider and think about the implementation...
